actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that the nature of services provided by any post office facility may not be changed without the approval of a majority of the patrons of the facility.

summary.text: Prohibits the United States Postal Service from changing the nature of postal services provided by any post office unless such change is approved in an election by persons regularly using such facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that the nature of services provided by any post office facility may not be changed without the approval of a majority of the patrons of the facility.
